rooms.description: A spacious open-plan area combining living and dining zones with Mediterranean style decor, large windows for natural light, and an outdoor view. Vastu recommendations include avoiding clutter and ensuring free flow of energy.
A serene bedroom with ample natural light and ventilation. Vastu: Placing the bed in the direction of the head aligned to the north.
A comfortable guest bedroom designed with Mediterranean aesthetics and proper ventilation. Vastu: Ensuring the door opens in the auspicious direction.
A dedicated private gym area featuring natural light and ventilation. Vastu: Placing gym equipment in a space that allows for free movement.
A functional and private bathroom attached to the master bedroom. Vastu: Ensuring water fixtures are placed in an auspicious direction.
A compact bathroom for the guest bedroom. Vastu: Placing fixtures appropriately to balance energy.

openings.description: A welcoming entrance that aligns with Vastu by facing the east or north for positive energy flow.
The primary entry point ensuring a smooth transition from outside to inside.
Large windows to allow ample natural light and ventilation in the open-plan living area. Vastu recommends positioning windows facing south or west.
Dual garage doors accommodating two cars with sufficient space for maneuvering. Vastu suggests keeping the garage away from main living areas.
A secondary exit that ensures quick egress in emergencies and maintains positive energy flow as per Vastu.
